BACKGROUND_DESCRIPTION: Once a card has been converted into its 3D variant, you can use this command to apply a Background to it. Use the "{{prefix}}backgroundshop" command to purchase Backgrounds
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NON_3D_CARDS: {{author}} You cannot apply a **Background** to non-3D cards
BG_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any **Background** with that ID
EMBED_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{background}}** **Background** to this card?
BG_APPLY_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{background}}** **Background** to your card
